org.youscope.client.uielements

Interface QuickLoggerModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultQuickLoggerModel

    public interface QuickLoggerModel
    Model of the quick logger.
    Author:
    mlang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
      Adds a listener which gets notified if the logged data changed.
      void addMessage(java.lang.String message, long time)
      Adds a message to the log.
      void clearMessages()
      Clears all messages/lines from the model.
      java.lang.String getLine(int line)
      Returns the message at the line with the given index.
      java.lang.String getLineTime(int line)
      Returns a string describing the creation time of the message, or null if not the first line of a message.
      int getMaxNumLines()
      Returns the maximal number of stored lines.
      int getNumLines()
      Returns current number of stored lines.
      int getTimeMaxChar()
      Returns the maximal number of characters the date string consists of.
      void removeActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
      Removes a previously added listener.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumLines

        int getNumLines()
        Returns current number of stored lines.
        Returns:
        Current number of stored lines.

      • getMaxNumLines

        int getMaxNumLines()
        Returns the maximal number of stored lines.
        Returns:
        maximal number of stored lines.

      • getLine

        java.lang.String getLine(int line)
        Returns the message at the line with the given index. The line = 0 corresponds to the last message.
        Parameters:
        line - Line to return.
        Returns:
        Message at given line.

      • getLineTime

        java.lang.String getLineTime(int line)
        Returns a string describing the creation time of the message, or null if not the first line of a message.
        Parameters:
        line - Line to return the creation line of.
        Returns:
        Creation time of message.

      • getTimeMaxChar

        int getTimeMaxChar()
        Returns the maximal number of characters the date string consists of.
        Returns:
        Maximal number of characters.

      • addActionListener

        void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Adds a listener which gets notified if the logged data changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to add.

      • removeActionListener

        void removeActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Removes a previously added listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to remove.

      • addMessage

        void addMessage(java.lang.String message,
                long time)
        Adds a message to the log. Line breaks in the message are converted into multiple lines.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to add.
        time - Time of message.

      • clearMessages

        void clearMessages()
        Clears all messages/lines from the model.
